config.title: Spotify Settings
config.description: Create a Web API application in the Spotify Developer Dashboard (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications), add your MMM redirect URL (e.g., http://localhost:5173/api/spotify/callback) and paste the generated credentials here. You can connect multiple accounts and monitor all currently playing tracks.

fields.label: Client ID
fields.description: Copy the Client ID from your Spotify app in https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard after creating the application.

fields.label: Client Secret
fields.description: Copy the Client Secret from the same Spotify app. Regenerate it in the dashboard if you lose access.

fields.label: Connected Accounts
fields.description: Spotify users linked through the MMM OAuth flow. Use the "Connect Spotify" button in the UI to populate this list.

itemFields.label: Account Name
itemFields.description: Optional name to identify this account

fields.label: Track Album Art Style
fields.description: Choose album art style for music tracks (vinyl record, rounded square, or cassette tape)

fields.label: Episode Album Art Style
fields.description: Choose album art style for podcast episodes (vinyl record, rounded square, or cassette tape)
